title: Why is ranked still available with this many  people dc'ing
body: I've remade a couple rank games in a row with multiple people not loading in on both teams if the bug is this bad why is ranked still available people are gonna be super butt hurt about the LP losses.

replies.body: Honestly the S**storm already on the boards makes quite a point about that.

So I've noticed, I should've known the boards would be in turmoil with this happening I just couldn't figure out why they would let ranked still be played if it was that bad and from the looks of it, it was worse that I thought.

But, enough are experiencing it that its all across the board and not everyone knows this is an issue on their first game of the day they shouldn't have to take 1 loss of the day due to an issue they don't know
I only reqeued because my first game had a single dc and I thought nothing of it but four in the next game made me reconsider.

As we realized our servers were having problems keeping players connected to their games, we disabled ranked play to avoid any other casualties. We may not have realized as quickly as we would have liked, but rest easy that we are working to help anyone who was affected. 

Thanks for being patient while we work through everyone's case!

While we thank you for doing what you can to fix the game we all enjoy and most of us understand that issues are bound to occur with a game of this magnitude I think you'll find that it was the lack of response from riot that made the issue as big as it became. What I mean by that is that anyone who stepped into a ranked game or glanced at your boards could've easily told you that the issue was affecting a large amount of your player base and that our outrage stems mainly from a company with as much expertise and as large as riot believing that not acting to preserve the stability of the ranked system for a period of roughly four hours is anything but a slap in the face to the people who enjoy its competitiveness.
